CustomField.description: All attendee registrations minus any no shows or cancellations. (Check the Include Industry check box if you want this to include industry registrations.)
CustomField.formula: IF( Include_Industry__c = TRUE, Govt_Registrations__c + Industry_Registrations__c - No_Shows_Cancellations_Formula__c , Govt_Registrations__c -No_Shows_Cancellations_Formula__c)
CustomField.label: Attendee Registrations
